import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../../assets/Logo.svg' import './header.styles.scss'; import {auth } from '../../../firebase/Firebase.Utils' const Header = ({currentUser}) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
SING OUT
